interestingcomments.content: A magnificent steam vessel and even better photographs of her. An American asked why the Dutch were such superior shipbuilders and the Dutchman replied: "We put our engineers on a pedestal, you put your accountants." A lot of truth there.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: a magnificent steam vessel and even better photographs of her. an american asked why the dutch were such superior shipbuilders and the dutchman replied: "we put -----> our !!!  -----> engineers !!!  on a pedestal, you put your accountants." a lot of truth there.

interestingcomments.content: A magnificent steam vessel and even better photographs of her. An American asked why the Dutch were such superior shipbuilders and the Dutchman replied: "We put our engineers on a pedestal, you put your accountants." A lot of truth there. In this case, I must agree, the workmanship is exceptional.
